mapper.select: select distinct m.id , parentId, name, url, perms,`type`,icon,orderNum,gmtCreate, gmtModified from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menuId left join sys_user_role ur on rm.roleId =ur.roleId where ur.userId = #{id} and m.type in(0,1) order by m.orderNum asc
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menuId left join sys_user_role ur on rm.roleId = ur.roleId where ur.userId = #{id}
